BASIC (2003)

IMDb........www.imdb.com/title/tt0264395/

Academy Award nominee John Travolta and Samuel L. Jackson team up with action director John McTiernan in a white-knuckle "thrill ride with a twist you won&#039;t believe!"  Also starring Connie Nielsen, Giovanni Ribisi, Brian Van Holt, Taye Diggs and Roselyn Sanchez.

A DEA officer is recruited to investigate the mysterious disappearance of a famed U.S. Army drill instructor and a group of cadets on a routine military exercise in the jungles of Panama.  But the journey to uncover the truth leads to some dangerous and unexpected places when two rescued survivors tell dramatically different versions of what transpired. "Totally mesmerizing."
